typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as integer,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as integer,
		HIRE_DATE as date 'dd-MM-yyyy',
		JOB_ID as string,
		SALARY as float,
		COMMISSION_PCT as float,
		MANAGER_ID as integer,
		DEPARTMENT_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ADLSgen2EMP
ADLSgen2EMP alterRow(upsertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as integer,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as integer,
		HIRE_DATE as date,
		JOB_ID as string,
		SALARY as decimal(8,2),
		COMMISSION_PCT as decimal(2,2),
		MANAGER_ID as integer,
		DEPARTMENT_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['EMPLOYEE_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		EMPLOYEE_ID,
		FIRST_NAME,
		LAST_NAME,
		EMAIL,
		PHONE_NUMBER,
		HIRE_DATE,
		JOB_ID,
		SALARY,
		COMMISSION_PCT,
		MANAGER_ID,
		DEPARTMENT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
